ref.value: fill my hat with gold , and work for a year as my laborer

ref.value: `` What 's this ? '' yelled the peasant . `` I told you to slaughter one sheep , and you have slaughtered them all ! ''
ref.head: What yelled the peasant . `` I told you to slaughter one sheep , and you have slaughtered them all ! ''

ref.value: a grandson who was born only yesterday

ref.value: one condition - if you lag behind , I will kill you
